Exaggerate: The claim in the Facebook post exaggerates the situation by stating that WHO excluded Nigeria from the Covid-19 vaccine scheme.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on an article within the post and a report from Sahara Reporters, both of which misinterpret the statements made by WHO Africa regional director Matshidiso Moeti.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Nigeria was disqualified from receiving COVAX-supplied vaccines, when in fact, it was not mentioned by Moeti.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Nigeria was not excluded from the vaccine scheme, but rather did not make the cut for the first consignment of Pfizer vaccines.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the decision to choose certain countries for the first consignment of vaccines was based on various criteria, including mortality rates, new cases, trends, and capacities to deliver and store the vaccines.
